title: Next steps in the CERTAIN project

author: Aleš Žnidarič, Slovenian National Building and Civil Engineering Institute

segmentation: So the the next presentation is on continuation of the certain project and it's my turn.
So where do we go next and I?
On Purpose Rd, certain project, not certain cluster because as you heard yesterday, the other two projects officially end in two days.
Or yeah in two.
Days.
In certain, we have eight more months to go, and these are the tasks that we need to complete until we finish the project.
So the first one is the project management managers training, translation of dispensing archs documents.
But the participation of the theore 2010.
Knowledge sharing.
And of course, what the question we would like to answer is what is.
Going to happen after certain finish.
Is.
If I go one by one, the project managers training.
I mentioned yesterday that some budget.
Was left and this is the reason that we're going to organize another project management training.
Project managers training, which will take place next month in Brussels.
We again have around 15 candidates according to the same scheme as before, so around 50% from the new Member States and around 50% of ladies.
The second one is translation of the reports.

The plan is to translate deliverable suspense in arch is so it will be decided it has been decided is being decided which deliverables this will be spent already have has a very nice executive summary which is going to be translated into several languages.
Arch is going to do something similar.
We discussed yesterday that Becausw work package five of Arch is produced.
A very nice movie about the news.
This new Ultra high performance.
Fiber reinforced material.
It would be very good to translate the movie itself, so this is probably one of the next steps that will be done.
In principle, the budget allows something like 60 to 80 pages in of translation in each language we will see in the end what this means.
So Spencer Artist Partners will decide what to translate and into which languages to translate.
If I go to the transport research arena, I.
Put up yesterday all 10 events that certain has organized so from one hour from now when we finish with this one, it's only workshop at PRI 2010 which remains.
And as I said yesterday, it will take place in Brussels in June next year in square Brussels Meeting Center.
This is a renovated center as far as I know, so there are no photos yet.
This is how it should look underneath, not the atomium up there, but the the picture in the bottom.

We have developed into certain some tools.
One I will show this is the Internet tool.
For La PD, as it is called, we also have a project database.
If you go to the full website you will find listed all the projects from the last 15 years.
Probably that were taken care by thorough and you can find out there all necessary information including most of the deliverables.
Steve said that definitely from now on or let's say from a few years back all the deliverables are available.
All sites are still alive.
Maybe it's difficult to say so for some of the older ones, but.
Definitely the future will go to that.
That information will available will be available for a long time.
Indoor this category of knowledge sharing we can also count presentation at different events or theore TRB.
Many other professional events where you can share your experience from the projects.
So where do we go after certain?
Definitely want to enforce Contacts with the end users.
We had this national seminars which proved very successful.
I think I have a slide afterwards, yes?
Then we will focus on activities for researchers like management training, exploitation in general and of course are there any new projects in the future that we could.
We could continue the work.
We started here.
So if I start with the national workshops, they really proved very successful tool for dissemination of the results.
We did some inquiries after this Lewin workshop.
First of all, we were surprised about the feedback because we got almost almost 50% of the participants answered, which is success of its own and all of them encouraged us to do this.
Also in the future.
So to share from time to time experience of.
European research in some kind of national events.

And even her we set the question because that workshop was of course covered within the budget of certain, and they are even willing to pay some small fee to attend this kind of workshops or seminars.
Which is, I think, very positive and shows that there is interest in getting this kind of knowledge.
Translation of report.
I showed this graph yesterday.
Bill asked me why Ireland and UK are so bad in English, but as far as I know, this chart represents only the native speakers.
So if the native speakers are English, they're not in this chart.
So so these are only non native speakers from those countries.
Anyway, this dissemination in national language, so translation of reports is crucial.
To do efficiently disseminate results of European research.
We are trying to find out a way how to include that into all or maybe most of the future European projects.
We have started some discussions with the Director General on Translation.
They should have some mechanisms to support this kind of activities an we hope that in the end we will have some positive answer from their side.
Management training it is essential to maintain soffici.
Number of projects and work package leaders as much as said yesterday.
Partners learn fast and work package leaders learn fast, but still without this kind of education, you do far too many mistakes in the early stages.
So people are then disappointed.
While they didn't get the projects they put so much effort in it into the proposal and they were unsuccessful.
This so this should be.
A good tool to avoid this kind of disappointment.
It's very high interest within institutes.
Again within certain this was covered through the project and we should find another mechanism how to finance this kind of of seminars.

This is.

There is no duplication of databases.
We wanted to provide a tool which would give us a feedback from the end users.
So are they happy with what they find or not or what should we improve?
And should be intended for all type of users.
So researchers, industry and users, infrastructure owners, maintainers and so on.

That is available.

Eight months of this certain project.
